titleStmt.title: Miscelanea medica, or, A supplement to kitchin-physick to which is added a short discourse on stoving and bathing : with some transient and occasional notes on Dr. George Thompsons galino-mempsis.
titleStmt.author: Cock, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Item at UMI microfilm reel 2461 bound and filmed with: Kitchin-physick: or, Advice to the poor (Wing C4792B).
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library.
